message.content:
cs.ET, cs.NE, cs.OH, cs.IT, cs.CV 

The paper discusses the use of optical hardware for neuromorphic computing, which falls under the category of Emerging Technologies (cs.ET). The focus is on improving the performance of optical weighting elements, which is a key component of neural networks, and this falls under the category of Neural and Evolutionary Computing (cs.NE). The paper also discusses the use of optical hardware for data processing, which falls under the category of Optics (cs.OH). The authors also mention the use of information theory to analyze the performance of their method, which falls under the category of Information Theory (cs.IT). Finally, the authors mention the use of their method for image classification, which falls under the category of Computer Vision (cs.CV).
